backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing door entry management with CRUD operations, rounding logic for height/width dimensions, square footage calculation, and amount computation based on rate per square foot.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (input form, display components, list view, grand totals, and UI design) to their corresponding files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of frontend files describing the main app structure, form/display/list components, React Query hooks, and styling with wood-inspired color palette.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes with neutral grayscale palette and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, app title, root div, and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating layout with header, three-section content (form, list, totals), footer, and refresh coordination via state trigger passed to child components.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryDisplay: Card component displaying a single door entry with rounded size, square feet, amount, and delete button with loading state.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryForm.ts: Form component with three numeric inputs (height, width, rate with default 185) that validates, submits to backend via mutation, shows loading state, and displays toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryList.ts: List component fetching and rendering all door entries with loading/error states, empty state message, and delete functionality with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/GrandTotals.tsx: React component that displays grand totals (total square feet and total amount) for all door entries using a card layout with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, creating anonymous or authenticated actors and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching door entries and grand totals, plus mutations for adding and deleting door entries with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom wood-inspired color palette for light and dark modes using OKLCH color space, plus typography optimizations for numeric data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom color system using OKLCH, typography with Inter and JetBrains Mono fonts, animations, and container settings with typography and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a door calculation application with custom rounding logic for dimensions, square footage calculations, and feature tracking for input forms, entry lists, and grand totals display.
